text: The discography of Chinese singer Lay Zhang (Zhang Yixing), consists of three studio albums, three extended plays, sixteen singles and five soundtrack appearances. In May 2016, he released his first solo single called "Monodrama" for the Station project. Zhang made his official solo debut on October 7, 2016 with the release of the song "What U Need?". His first extended play, titled Lose Control, was released on October 28 of the same year.
